achievement.title: Alone in the Darkness (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Yogg-Saron without the assistance of any Keepers in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: They're Coming Out of the Walls (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat 9 Guardians of Yogg-Saron within 12 seconds in 25-player mode.

criteria.description: Kill 9 Guardians of Yogg-Saron in 12 seconds..

achievement.title: Getting Back to Nature (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Freya while she is affected by 25 stacks of Attuned to Nature in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: Cheese the Freeze (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Hodir without any raid member being hit by Flash Freeze in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: Getting Cold in Here (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Hodir without any raid member having more than 2 stacks of Biting Cold in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: With Open Arms (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Kologarn without destroying either of his arms in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: If Looks Could Kill (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Kologarn without any raid member being hit by Focused Eyebeams in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: Hot Pocket (25 player)
achievement.description: Survive being thrown into Ignis the Furnace Master's Slag Pot in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: The Light of Dawn
achievement.description: Defeat the Lich King in Icecrown Citadel in 25-player Heroic mode.

achievement.title: Heroic: Fall of the Lich King (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat every boss in Icecrown Citadel in 25-player Heroic mode.

achievement.title: All You Can Eat (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Sindragosa in 25-player mode without any member of your raid receiving more than 5 stacks of Mystic Buffet.

achievement.title: Heroic: The Frostwing Halls (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat the bosses of The Frostwing Halls in Icecrown Citadel in 25-player Heroic mode.

achievement.title: Heroic: The Plagueworks (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat the bosses of The Plagueworks in Icecrown Citadel in 25-player Heroic mode.

achievement.description: Obtain the Ashes of Al'ar from Kael'thas Sunstrider in Tempest Keep.

achievement.title: Platform Hero
achievement.description: Survive for 90 seconds on the pillars in the Swollen Vault.

achievement.title: Now I Am the Master
achievement.description: Take on an apprentice in the arts of cooking, and teach your student to become an expert.

achievement.title: Heroic: Twin Consorts
achievement.description: Defeat the Twin Consorts in Throne of Thunder on Heroic difficulty.

achievement.title: Ritualist Who?
achievement.description: Defeat all 24 different Dark Ritualists on Normal or Heroic difficulty on separate visits to the Dark Animus chamber in Throne of Thunder.

achievement.description: Defeat Primordius in Throne of Thunder on Heroic difficulty.

achievement.description: Defeat each wing of Dire Maul.

achievement.description: Defeat the Council of Elders in Throne of Thunder on Heroic difficulty.

achievement.title: Sworn to the Deathsworn
achievement.description: Earn Exalted status with the Ashtongue Deathsworn.

achievement.title: The Arcatraz
achievement.description: Defeat Harbinger Skyriss.

achievement.title: Less Than Three
achievement.description: Defeat Wind Lord Mel'jarak without crowd-controlling more than 2 of his swarm at once on Normal or Heroic difficulty in Heart of Fear.

achievement.title: Got My Mind On My Money
achievement.description: Loot 100,000 gold.

achievement.title: Save it for Later
achievement.description: Complete the Greenstone Village scenario without using any Volatile Greenstone Brew.

achievement.title: Chapter IV: Celestial Blessings
achievement.description: Accompany Wrathion on his journey to obtain blessings from the four August Celestials.

achievement.description: Discover the secrets of the mogu with Wrathion, and deliver to him the heart of the Thunder King.
